titleStmt.title: Tom Tell-Truth. All you that will not me believe, disprove me if you can; you by my story may perceive, I am an honest man. To the tune of, Tantararara, tantivee.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "I killed a man and he was dead ..."
Date and place of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
